Class Sign

java.lang.Object
  libai.common.Sign
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Function
public class Sign
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function

Signum function F(x) = 0 if x < 0 or 1 if x >= 1 This function is not derivable.

kronenthaler
